elements.content: Synthesis of homometallic divalent lanthanide organoimides from benzyl complexes† Benjamin M. Wolf Christoph Stuhl and Reiner Anwander IIII1–3IV4,5II6,78–121314–1676–16IIIII17–19IIIIIII20–22II23IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII24,2526,27II19,28–3031–33IIIISalt-metathesis protocol for the preparation of Ln(II) dibenzyl compounds [Ln(CH2Ph)2]n (1-Ln; tentatively assigned as solvent-free) from the corresponding Ln(II) iodides and benzyl potassium in thf. Crystallisation from donor solvents allowed for the characterisation of donor-coordinated complexes 1-Ybthp, 1-Ybdme, 1-Smdo (do = thf/thp), and 1-Euthf.

Salt-metathesis protocol for the preparation of Ln(II) dibenzyl compounds [Ln(CH2Ph)2]n (1-Ln; tentatively assigned as solvent-free) from the corresponding Ln(II) iodides and benzyl potassium in thf. Crystallisation from donor solvents allowed for the characterisation of donor-coordinated complexes 1-Ybthp, 1-Ybdme, 1-Smdo (do = thf/thp), and 1-Euthf.

elements.content: Scheme 1 Salt-metathesis protocol for the preparation of Ln(II) dibenzyl compounds [Ln(CH2Ph)2]n (1-Ln; tentatively assigned as solvent-free) from the corresponding Ln(II) iodides and benzyl potassium in thf. Crystallisation from donor solvents allowed for the characterisation of donor-coordinated complexes 1-Ybthp, 1-Ybdme, 1-Smdo (do = thf/thp), and 1-Euthf.

Crystallisation from donor solvents allowed for the characterisation of donor-coordinated complexes 1-Ybthp, 1-Ybdme, 1-Smdo (do = thf/thp), and 1-Euthf.

cln_elements.content: Synthesis of homometallic divalent lanthanide organoimides from benzyl complexes† Benjamin M. Wolf Christoph Stuhl and Reiner Anwander IIII1–3IV4,5II6,78–121314–1676–16IIIII17–19IIIIIII20–22II23IIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIII24,2526,27II19,28–3031–33IIIISalt-metathesis protocol for the preparation of Ln(II) dibenzyl compounds [Ln(CH2Ph)2]n (1-Ln; tentatively assigned as solvent-free) from the corresponding Ln(II) iodides and benzyl potassium in thf. Crystallisation from donor solvents allowed for the characterisation of donor-coordinated complexes 1-Ybthp, 1-Ybdme, 1-Smdo (do = thf/thp), and 1-Euthf.
